description:
Become a firefighter in a major US city in Firefighting Simulator – The Squad. Fight dangerous fires with your friends in co-op multiplayer mode or by yourself in single-player mode.

Get behind the wheel of an officially licensed fire truck, grab your hose, and fight realistic fires to save lives. Discover over 40 diverse deployment locations spread throughout a huge city inspired by the North American West Coast. Equip yourself with authentic firefighting gear, such as helmets, firefighter boots, and breathing apparatus from well-known firefighting equipment manufacturers. 

Every second counts. Your city needs you! 

Multiplayer co-op mode in which you can play with up to three friends in whichever role suits you best. Assign tasks to your team or jump into the action yourself. Become firefighting heroes of your city with your squad and save the lives of your neighbors and townspeople.

Single-player mode in which you can become the leader of an experienced firefighting team. Guide your squad to success in missions and extinguish as many fires as possible.

Advanced fire simulation, including water, smoke, heat, back drafts, flashovers, grease fires, and a wide range of other causes of fires, such as electrical, chemical, and explosions.

Five licensed Rosenbauer America fire trucks, such as the TP3® Pumper and the T-Rex® hydraulic platform.

Authentic equipment by well-known US firefighting industry brands, such as Cairns®, MSA G1® SCBA, and HAIX®. 

A large US city with different districts, such as an industrial area, suburbs, and downtown.
name: Firefighting Simulator - The Squad
